destinations.name: Blue Mountain
destinations.description: Blue Mountain is a famous mountain range known for its scenic beauty and coffee plantations.

destinations.name: Bocas del Toro
destinations.description: Bocas del Toro is an archipelago located in the Caribbean Sea, known for its beautiful beaches and marine life.

destinations.name: Brazil
destinations.description: Brazil is the largest country in South America, famous for its diverse culture, Amazon rainforest, and iconic landmarks like Christ the Redeemer.

destinations.name: Hawaii
destinations.description: Hawaii is a group of islands known for their stunning beaches, volcanoes, and unique Polynesian culture.

destinations.name: Iguacu-falls
destinations.description: Iguazu Falls is a breathtaking waterfall on the border of Argentina and Brazil, surrounded by lush greenery.

destinations.name: Jamaica
destinations.description: Jamaica is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its reggae music, sandy beaches, and vibrant culture.

destinations.name: Kilauea Volcano
destinations.description: Kilauea Volcano is an active volcano located in Hawaii, famous for its lava flows and geological significance.

destinations.name: Montego Bay
destinations.description: Montego Bay is a popular tourist destination in Jamaica, known for its resorts, beaches, and vibrant nightlife.

destinations.name: Na Pali Coast
destinations.description: Na Pali Coast is a stunning coastline on the island of Kauai, Hawaii, featuring dramatic cliffs and lush valleys.

destinations.name: Oahu's North Shore
destinations.description: Oahu's North Shore is famous for its big waves, attracting surfers from around the world.

destinations.name: Panama Canal
destinations.description: The Panama Canal is an engineering marvel connecting the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans, facilitating global trade.

destinations.name: Panama City
destinations.description: Panama City is the capital and largest city of Panama, known for its modern skyline and historical landmarks.

destinations.name: Panama
destinations.description: Panama is a country in Central America, famous for its diverse ecosystems, wildlife, and rich cultural heritage.

destinations.name: Pao de Acucar
destinations.description: Pao de Acucar, also known as Sugarloaf Mountain, is an iconic peak in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, offering panoramic views of the city.

destinations.name: Port Antonio
destinations.description: Port Antonio is a town in Jamaica, known for its natural beauty, lush landscapes, and tranquil beaches.

destinations.name: Salvador
destinations.description: Salvador is a vibrant city in Brazil, renowned for its Afro-Brazilian culture, colonial architecture, and lively festivals.

destinations.name: Santa Catalina
destinations.description: Santa Catalina is a popular surfing destination in Panama, offering stunning beaches and world-class waves.

destinations.name: Sao Paulo
destinations.description: Sao Paulo is the largest city in Brazil and South America, known for its cultural diversity, gastronomy, and economic significance.

destinations.name: Tower Isle
destinations.description: Tower Isle is a small island off the coast of Jamaica, offering secluded beaches and a relaxing atmosphere.

destinations.name: Waikiki Beach
destinations.description: Waikiki Beach is a famous beach in Honolulu, Hawaii, popular for surfing, swimming, and sunbathing.
